title: Is Oscar Piastri being too nice for his own good?
summary: Oscar Piastri's willingness to give up second place at Monza kept McLaren happy, but will he regret lacking the ruthlessness that defines modern Formula 1 champions?

qa_pairs.question: Which team does Oscar Piastri drive for in Formula 1?
What position did Oscar Piastri give up during the Monza race?
What trait is often associated with successful Formula 1 champions?
